code_snippet: bl sym.imp.nvram_get; bl sym.imp.nvram_set; bl sym.imp.nvram_unset; bl sym.imp.nvram_commit

description: Multiple NVRAM access functions were identified in the /usr/lib/libnvram.so library. The nvram_get function poses a potential buffer overflow vulnerability as it utilizes strcpy to copy variable names without length checks.
code_snippet: mov r1, r8; mov r0, r5; bl loc.imp.strcpy

description: Discovered advanced NVRAM configuration functions acosNvramConfig series, which provide encryption and encoding capabilities but lack detailed error handling and input validation.
